# PAD::DISABLE_ALL_CONTROL_ACTIONS

## Summary
Disables all the inputs for a player control

## Parameters
* **CONTROL_TYPE** control

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
control: see IS_CONTROL_ENABLED
